exact_match.description: Whether to perform exact match instead of LIKE matching for name search

name: create_item_request
description: Create a new item request in ServiceNow. This is used to create a request for a specific item. You can link multiple item requests to a single request object.

requested_for.title: Requested For

quantity.title: Quantity

request.description: The sys_id of the request object this item request belongs to
request.title: Request

state.description: The state number of the item request. 1 = New, 2 = In Progress, 3 = Resolved, 6 = Resolved, 7 = Closed, 8 = Cancelled
state.title: State

short_description.description: The short description of the item request
short_description.title: Short Description

short_description.description: Filter by short description of the item request

table.description: Table to get the records from
table.title: Table

fields.description: Specific fields to get from the table. If not provided, all fields will be returned.
fields.title: Fields

filters.description: Filters to apply to the records. You must provide the field name and value of the field. You can have many field filters together. ^ indicates AND operation. ^OR indicates OR operation. LIKE is used for partial string matching. This must be a string.
filters.title: Filters

limit.description: Limit the number of records to return
limit.title: Limit

inputSchema.title: GetAnyTableParams
